body:
If your wondering what will happen if the MC thought with his brain instead of his dick...

Then look no further...

https://archiveofourown.org/works/33892285/chapters/84273385?view_adult=true
Fucking Beta, I told my bros if they touch the girl I like they beter have good health insurance, cause I would beat the shit out of the one to touch her, ptew!! Beta!
How the hell is this become NTR chitose and the mc arent in relationship yet
"It's an absolute unit" kek
guy is way too timid so he has to learn his mistakes so someday he'll grow up! and the girl just going with the flow! she'll learn something after she get's ruined! i don't feel pity for anyone! bye!
i think I've read somewhat similar to this
The slim guy kinda deserved this, he never spoke up.
That glasses girl planned all of this to happen as soon she saw condom the gear in her head starting turning
looking at it from Chitose's perspective, the MC never confessed, didn't save her from esentially being raped and had sex with another female instead. the first panel in page 26 is pretty telling.

The MC didn't choose Chitose at all. You should look closer to Chitose eyes when MC just choose another girl next to her. She is hurt inside. As a men, MC need to protect Chitose at the beginning, any normal men would protect Chitose at that time. And after all, if MC and Chitose still love each other, they can comeback. Sex is natural behavior, Chitose had sex which another men does not mean she will be ugly and dirty, same as the case MC with another girl. If I am MC, I will confess to Chitose, put some effort, base on her attitude, then decide to date her or move on.
This dude is such a cuck. I can't imagine how you can be a friend to some girl you like for more than a month without asking her out. Generic NTR protagonists are amazing in a way.
This got darker in just a matter of pages
Hori should have given up on her here. Hell, in chapter 1 when she agreed to go along with Mika's shenanigans...
@BootyStank I think you're confused. The one manipulated easily was Chitose.
Oh fuck i started hating ntr to loving ntr oh no help me

like if your already that far just tell her u like her and bang her. Like I don't understand why act a timid and get manipulated so easily. You guys are fucking have sex so like taker her virginity you beta male.
head to chap 4 eng to see my explanation why the mc is fit for chitose ...
That montage on the first chapter, priceless.
I Feel bad for the mc
It feels like Glasses Girl manipulated behind the scenes. MC was too easy to use. No they all were!
@Ecrald, what?
I mean, crush
Fuck, as the MC, I know how it feels when your childhood got fucked by your own friend. T. T
Hm feels bad for the MC but at least he got the chance to fuck mika and not doing anything like other doujin
Mika is the perfect succubus. Love how bossy and assertive she is. I want to nut inside her.
I feel bad for MC tho, he should have done something
well at least MC got laid too, i frickin love story like this
@pettam Aaron maybe we can continue our conversation here if you look in recent comments.

Well, I certainly don't feel bad for MC-kun right there. The guy didn't say anything when asked if she likes the girl, when she's about to give a blowjob, and before she got fucked. If you don't do anything to fight for for the most important person in your life, you deserve absolutely fucking nothing. Blonde guy deserves her.
He doesn't even confesse, it's not really ntr
Whoever says its ntr is beta vanilla fag they weren't together in the first place so how the fuck is this ntr?

Its his fault. So what youre rejected after confessing at least youll have closure. I was this dude in the past( except no sex stuff) all it takes is balls like that chad over there. But I guess this will probably result to character development in the future
Sorry but I can't with ntr, it just felt so bad that I can't keep reading. Well, I tried it... But ntr is not my thing.
good fap material I just cant bear the story deym!!
Good job dude, as always the MC lost the opportunity to confess for 2-3 years in a row? And his crush got stolen by the guy who was forward about it.
So is this guys cock larger (Ntr signs for end story) the full censorship cant really make me see.
10/10 for art but story line , 5
How did i miss this story?! AHAHA!!!
I'm lovin this story so far~
